attributes.action: Make prisons into punishment centres and get rid of the holiday camp image.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country has prisons where the inmates are let out at weekends for home visits, some prisoners walk out of the prison grounds on a daily basis, walk to the prison car park, get into their own cars and drive to work for up to 6 days a week. This is whilst being supported by the British taxpayer. This type of imprisonment must be stopped.
